title: ImageCopy
name: ImageCopy
description: Copies a rectangular area of an image.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the source rectangle.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the source rectangle.

arguments.name: width
arguments.description: The width of the source rectangle.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the source rectangle.

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the destination rectangle.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the destination rectangle.
